org.jetel.data

Class RecordComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.RecordComparator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<DataRecord>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RecordComapratorAnyOrderType, RecordOrderedComparator

    public class RecordComparator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<DataRecord>
    This class compares two records of the same structure (created based on the same or at least compatible metadata).
    Used primarily for sorting data records when it can be passed into JDK's standard sorting methods.
    Since:
    February 28, 2004

      • compare

        public int compare(RecordKey secondKey,
          DataRecord record1,
          DataRecord record2)
        Compares two records (can have different layout) based on defined key-fields and returns (-1;0;1) if (< ; = ; >).
        The particular fields to be compared have to be of the same type !
        Parameters:
        secondKey - RecordKey defined for the second record
        record1 - First record
        record2 - Second record
        Returns:
        -1 ; 0 ; 1
